attributes.action: Improve safety on the number 25 bus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that the wellbeing of the vast majority of the public that use this bus is being undermined by a minority who believe they can pickpocket individuals on this bus on a regular basis. This petition is asking the PM to help eliminate the crime that plagues the 25 Bus or put pressure on the London Mayor to act now! Phone theft on this bus is now in the ascendancy and it needs to be halted.
